name: Pairs TV - Train Your Mind
description:
Welcome to Pairs!

You know this game: There are randomly shuffled cards lying face down and at each turn you turn two of them around to see the hidden image.

If you select two with matching images then you score a point.

-> Score points directly one after another to collect the streak bonus. How many pairs in a row can you score?

Play this game alone or against a friend!

Choose between two image sets and three board sizes (4x4, 6x6, 8x8)!

Got an idea on how to make this app better? Great, please send an email to: theoryapps@gmail.com .

Also available on iPhone and iPad.

|= Made (with love!) in Hamburg. =|
